message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,500. I believe this product would be very valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  That price is a bit high for me. Could you do $10,500?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. To be honest, $10,750 is the highest I can go.
